item.title: See some of the most memorable moments from Pope Francis' papacy
item.description: From consoling a young boy whose father had recently died, to preaching in an eerily empty St. Peter's Square during the pandemic, Francis understood how his actions, as much as his words, could preach the Gospel.

item.title: Pope Francis dies at 88. And, House Democrats press for Abrego Garcia's return
item.description: Gone at age 88, Pope Francis was one of the most popular popes in decades and a towering figure on the world stage. And, House Democrats visit El Salvador to demand Kilmar Abrego Garcia's return.

item.description: Accepting a prestigious European prize in 2016, he sharply scolded the European Union for its treatment of migrants and fraying sense of unity.

item.title: Zelenskyy pays tribute to the pope, who angered Ukrainians in recent years
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy posted a photo of himself shaking hands with Pope Francis and praised the pontiff as someone who "knew how to give hope, ease suffering through prayer, and foster unity.
